project package¶

Submodules¶

project.AnonymiseWithREGEX module¶

This module contains a function that replaces personal information in a text with placeholders.

project.AnonymiseWithREGEX.anonymize_text(text: str) → str[source]¶

Replace personal information in the given text with anonymized placeholders.

Args:

text (str): The text to be anonymized.

Returns:

str: The anonymized text.

project.AnonymiseWithTransformers module¶

This module provides a class implementing EntityRecognizer for Transformers pipeline.

class project.AnonymiseWithTransformers.TransformerRecognizer(model_id_or_path: str, mapping_labels: dict, aggregation_strategy: str = 'simple', supported_language: str = 'fr', ignore_labels: list = ['O', 'MISC'])[source]¶

Bases: EntityRecognizer

Class implementing EntityRecognizer for Transformers pipeline.

Args:

model_id_or_path (str): The model id or path to the transformers model. mapping_labels (dict): A dictionary mapping transformers labels to presidio labels. aggregation_strategy (str, optional): The aggregation strategy to use in the transformers pipeline. Defaults to “simple”. supported_language (str, optional): The language supported by the class. Defaults to “fr”. ignore_labels (list, optional): A list of labels to ignore in the transformers pipeline. Defaults to [“O”, “MISC”].

analyze(text: str, entities=None, nlp_artifacts: NlpArtifacts = None)[source]¶

Extract entities using Transformers pipeline.

Args:

text (str): The text to analyze entities (list, optional): The list of entities to extract. Defaults to None. nlp_artifacts (NlpArtifacts, optional): The nlp artifacts. Defaults to None.

Returns:

list: A list of RecognizerResult objects

load() → None[source]¶

No loading is required.

This method is part of the EntityRecognizer interface and is called to load the model or perform any necessary setup. Since the Transformer model is loaded during initialization, there is no need to load it again in the load method.

project.AnonymiseWithTransformers.anonymise_with_transformer(new_text_fr)[source]¶

Anonymise the given text using transformer pipeline.

Args:

new_text_fr (str): The text to anonymise.

Returns:

str: The anonymised text.

project.Run_Anonymise module¶

This module contains the code for the anonymisation process.

project.Run_Anonymise.anonymise_column(df, companies_split, name_column)[source]¶

Anonymise the given column in the dataframe by replacing potential personal information with placeholders.

Parameters:

df (DataFrame): The pandas DataFrame containing the data. companies_split (list): A list of lists containing the cleaned and split unique values from the specified column. name_column (str): The name of the column in the DataFrame.

Returns:

DataFrame: The DataFrame with the anonymized column.

project.Run_Anonymise.anonymise_description(df, names)[source]¶

Anonymize the names in the “Description” column of the dataframe.

Parameters:

df (DataFrame): The pandas DataFrame containing the data. names (list): A list of lists containing the cleaned and split unique values from the specified column.

Returns:

DataFrame: The DataFrame with the anonymized “Description” column.

project.Run_Anonymise.get_name_column(df, name_column)[source]¶

Get the unique values in the specified column of the dataframe, clean and split them, and return as a list of lists.

Parameters:

df (DataFrame): The pandas DataFrame containing the data. name_column (str): The name of the column in the DataFrame.

Returns:

list: A list of lists containing the cleaned and split unique values from the specified column.

project.Run_Anonymise.main(filenameCSV, filenameXLSX)[source]¶

Anonymise tickets.

Parameters:

filenameCSV (str): The path of the CSV file to anonymize. filenameXLSX (str): The path of the Excel file to save the anonymized data.

Returns:

None

project.Run_with_GUI module¶

This module provides a GUI for running the anonymization script.

project.Run_with_GUI.main()[source]¶

Run the GUI for the anonymization script.

This function creates the main window, creates and places the widgets, and runs the main loop to handle the user interaction.

project.Run_with_GUI.run_anonymization_script()[source]¶

Run the anonymization script with the selected parameters.

This function checks if the CSV file path and Excel file name have been selected. If not, it displays an error message.

If the Excel file name does not end with “.xlsx”, it also displays an error message.

If all the checks pass, it runs the anonymization script using the selected parameters. If the script runs successfully, it displays a success message and closes the window.

If an error occurs while running the script, it displays an error message with the error details.

project.Run_with_GUI.select_csv_file()[source]¶

Open a file dialog to select a CSV file and sets the file path to a StringVar.
